name: sailsjs-vue-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for SailJs with Vue 3 as its client side rendering

scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i && cd ..
scripts.prod: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run start
scripts.dev: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run dev

author: Hardy Joyson
